items.sentence: I've never fallen asleep in class, but I am guilty of daydreaming in class.
Tom got there early to make sure that everything had been set up correctly.
Tom asked me whether I would like to go to the Bon Festival dance with him.
Carrots are good for the eyes. Have you ever seen a rabbit with glasses on?
The food at the restaurant where Tom and I ate at last night was delicious.
Tom told me that if I wouldn't help him, he'd get someone else to help him.
Tom's grandmother is quite feeble and needs help with her daily activities.
Tom's speech was so boring that several people in the audience fell asleep.
Even though he was a school dropout, Tom was later very successful in life.
I wonder whether or not Tom could be persuaded to teach my children French.
